Step 1: Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and ginger and sautÃ© well. Add cabbage and carrot and toss on high heat.

 Step 2: Add chicken mince, soy sauce, 2 teaspoons oyster sauce, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well. Cook on high heat for 2-3 minutes.

 Step 3: Reserve some of the spring onion greens and add the remaining, switch off heat and mix well. Transfer onto a plate and let the mixture cool.

 Step 4: Mix flour with some water and mix to make a thick paste.

 Step 5: Place the spring roll sheets on a worktop. Put a portion of the cooked mixture on one side of each sheet and roll along with folding the edges. Apply the prepared paste on the edges and seal tightly.

 Step 6: Heat sufficient oil in a pan. Deep-fry the rolls till golden. Drain on absorbent paper.

 Step 7: To make the sauce, combine remaining soy sauce, vinegar, crushed red chillies, crushed peppercorns and reserved spring onion greens in a bowl. Add some water and mix well.

 Step 8: Serve hot with the prepared sauce.
